thread.title: ‘I love echo chambers’: Sally Kohn’s #Oscars wish shows why liberals are so out of touch
thread.title_full: ‘I love echo chambers’: Sally Kohn’s #Oscars wish shows why liberals are so out of touch

author: Greg P.
title: ‘I love echo chambers’: Sally Kohn’s #Oscars wish shows why liberals are so out of touch
text:
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 26, 2017 
Hey, go for it liberals: Democrats never want to win again. I am so here for it. Yes, let them be preachy, please! https://t.co/dJIX3BjK9q 
— Cassandra Fairbanks (@CassandraRules) February 27, 2017 So do Republicans. Not sure you get how this works. https://t.co/jsjLl68dXo 
— Ben Shapiro (@benshapiro) February 27, 2017 Trending IT BEGINS: Celebrities are wearing ACLU ribbons on the #Oscars red carpet 
Does she not see it? "I love echo chambers. We have some of the best echo chambers in the country. They're YUGE!"– every leftist during an awards ceremony https://t.co/RDq0jQ2PWs 
— Elliott Hamilton (@ElliottRHams) February 27, 2017 
And does this mean actors who don’t do this are cowards? I hope you shame any person who does not do this. https://t.co/cFCKxMQZu2 
Exit question: What happens if someone says something she disagrees with? As long as they say something you agree with, right? https://t.co/N8QIWVYUWe 
— Evan Siegfried (@evansiegfried) February 26, 2017 
*** 
Related: 
— Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) February 27, 2017 FUN IDEA: Interviewers should ask celebs with ACLU ribbons on the #Oscars red carpet about guns and the disabled https://t.co/5biXkYMwsy 
— Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) February 26, 2017 ‘Hollywood, don’t divide us’: Trump supporters gather at Hollywood and Vine https://t.co/VKLDnouVcz
